text:
Message 3129 of 4024
I don’t understand what you’re saying.
But I really don’t want to fight with you.
Let’s try again tomorrow. We can do this.!
Sent:06/11/2024 at 08:41 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/11/2024 at 09:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Call
Message 3130 of 4024
Im asking about the travel authorization. Adrian and I leave in less than two weeks for Canada.
Cabo you refused to return it. This forced us to change plans.
I also received a strange text from your Mother. It appears she may not have been told the seriousness of the issues.
Sent:06/11/2024 at 09:17 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/11/2024 at 09:23 PM)
Subject:Re: Call
Message 3131 of 4024
My Mom knows that we are getting a divorce. But as mentioned many times, I have chosen not to engage in the same character assassination you
have.
I don’t feel it’s helpful to have the kids grow up in a hateful and resentful family like you and yours. By contrast your mother is a reason we are here.
You and I are very different people. Your purpose in life is to hate, destroy, and rewrite our history and make sure everyone believes your false
narrative.
I’m choosing the truth and a path towards a way that does not make our kids hate a part of themselves. The part that is each of us. You want the
opposite.
I had asked for a break, not another escalation.
Sent:06/12/2024 at 06:28 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/12/2024 at 08:29 AM)
Subject:Re: Call
Message 3132 of 4024
So much for civil.
Sent:06/12/2024 at 08:30 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/12/2024 at 08:37 AM)
Subject:Re: Call
